name: react-native-chartbeat-cs
description: Work in progress. Not for production use. React Native wrapper for Chartbeat

scripts.postinstall: rm -rf react-native-chartbeat && git clone https://github.com/cisclub/react-native-chartbeat.git && rm -rf ios/Chartbeat.framework && cp -a react-native-chartbeat/ios/Chartbeat.framework ./ios && cp -a react-native-chartbeat/ios/Chartbeat.framework ../../ios && rm -rf react-native-chartbeat

author: cisclub, shukerullah
